sub_topic: Probability of a certain weather event occurring
message_1: A weather forecasting agency predicts that there is a 30% chance of rain occurring tomorrow. What is the probability that it will not rain tomorrow?
message_2: The probability that it will not rain tomorrow is the complement of the probability that it will rain. Since the probability of rain is 30%, the probability of no rain is 100% - 30% = 70%.
